What are the treatments for Shaken Baby Syndrome ?,"Emergency treatment for a baby who has been shaken usually includes life-sustaining measures such as respiratory support and surgery to stop internal bleeding and bleeding in the brain. Doctors may use brain scans, such as MRI and CT, to make a more definite diagnosis.",NINDS,Shaken Baby Syndrome
